name: We Were First
description:
Our species developed millions of years before all others. There will certainly be new intelligent life in the galaxy. We will listen for their radio signals. Signs of their civilization growing. Then build our armada to destroy it.

Exterminate all other civilizations in the galaxy before any of them has a chance to develop warp technology and challenge us.

Controls: point-and-click

Gameplay: Every second you generate power. Build power generators to get more energy. Build attack ships to send to alien civilizations. When a civilization appears, click it to send a ship. If any civilization gets to level 5 technology, game over.

Made in just a few days of total development time for Fermi Paradox Jam.
